Welcome to this semester's iteration of the seminar

(Neue Entwicklungen in den Energiemärkten) which can earn
    you 3 ECTS by holding a 20-minute presentation and leading a 15-minute
    discussion about it. You will be advised by one of the professors and
    researchers at our department.

We are in the process of finalizing the seminar schedule, which will be available in November 2023. As soon as the schedule is ready, we will fill out the information fields below and write an announcement. In case you've registered for the course on ISIS, you'll receive all the information in an automated email. In summary: to participate in this seminar, sign in to this course on ISIS platform, and check your TUB email.
